structure.unit: OFFENSES AGAINST PUBLIC HEALTH AND SAFETY

law.catch_line: Provision of services of personal emergency response system provider -- Prohibited acts.

text.section: A person shall not act or perform the services of a personal emergency response system provider in violation of the provisions of KRS 438.284.

A person performing the services of a personal emergency response system provider shall not:
Fail or refuse to promptly make any notification provided by KRS 438.284;
Violate any contract provision required by KRS 438.284; or
Direct, permit, or authorize any employee or agent of the personal emergency response system provider to do any act forbidden or to fail to do any act required by this section or by KRS 438.284.

law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 102, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2008.
